register.title: Become an Affiliate
register.description: Join our affiliate program and earn 20% lifetime commission on every referral

benefits.title: Why Join Our Affiliate Program?
benefits.commission: Earn 20% lifetime commission on all purchases made by your referrals
benefits.lifetime: Lifetime commissions - earn from every purchase your referrals make, forever
benefits.tracking: Advanced tracking with 90-day cookie window and detailed analytics
benefits.payout: Minimum $50 payout threshold with multiple payment options

form.title: Application Form
form.description: Please fill out this form to apply. Our team will review your application within 2-3 business days.

websiteUrl.label: Website URL
websiteUrl.description: Your primary website or blog where you'll promote our service

socialMediaUrls.label: Social Media URLs (Optional)
socialMediaUrls.description: Comma-separated list of your social media profiles (Twitter, Instagram, etc.)

promotionPlan.label: Promotion Plan
promotionPlan.description: Describe how you plan to promote our service (minimum 50 characters)
promotionPlan.placeholder: Example: I plan to write detailed review articles, create tutorial videos, and share on my newsletter with 10,000 subscribers...

estimatedReach.label: Estimated Reach (Optional)
estimatedReach.description: Your estimated monthly audience size (visitors, subscribers, followers)

customSlug.label: Custom Referral Slug (Optional)
customSlug.description: Create a custom vanity URL (e.g., 'my-blog' â†’ bookproof.app?ref=my-blog)

existingApplication.title: Affiliate Application Status
existingApplication.pending: Your affiliate application is currently under review. We'll notify you once it's been processed.
existingApplication.approved: Your affiliate application has been approved! You can now start promoting and earning commissions.

dashboard.title: Affiliate Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Your referral code
dashboard.noProfile: You don't have an affiliate profile yet.
dashboard.applicationPending: Your affiliate application is pending approval.

stats.commissionRateDescription: Your earnings percentage on each referral purchase
stats.availableDescription: Commissions cleared and ready to withdraw
stats.totalPaidDescription: Total amount paid out to you

recentCommissions.title: Recent Commissions
recentCommissions.empty: No commissions yet. Start promoting to earn commissions!

referralLinks.title: Referral Links
referralLinks.description: Share your unique referral link and start earning commissions

yourLink.title: Your Referral Link
yourLink.description: Share this link on your website, blog, social media, or anywhere your audience can see it

referralLinks.shareText: Check out BookProof - the best platform for book marketing and reader engagement!

performance.title: Link Performance
performance.description: Track how your referral link is performing

step1.title: Share Your Link
step1.description: Copy your unique referral link and share it with your audience

step2.title: Users Click Your Link
step2.description: When someone clicks your link, a 90-day tracking cookie is set

step3.title: User Registers & Purchases
step3.description: If they register within 90 days and make a purchase, you earn a commission

step4.title: Earn Lifetime Commissions
step4.description: You earn 20% on every purchase they make - for life!

qrCode.title: QR Code
qrCode.description: Scan this QR code to access your referral link

commissions.title: Commissions
commissions.description: View and track all your commission earnings

table.title: All Commissions
table.description: Complete history of your commission earnings
table.author: Author

info.title: Commission Status Information
info.pending: Pending: Commissions are held for 14 days to allow for potential refunds
info.approved: Approved: Commissions ready to be included in your next payout request
info.paid: Paid: Commissions that have been paid out to you

payouts.title: Payouts
payouts.description: Request payouts and view your payout history
payouts.pendingPayoutNotice: You have a pending payout request. Please wait for it to be processed before requesting another payout.

paymentDetails.label: Payment Details
paymentDetails.description: Enter your payment account details (email, wallet address, etc.)

notes.label: Notes (Optional)
notes.description: Any additional information for the admin

history.title: Payout History
history.description: View all your payout requests and their status

list.title: Affiliate Management
list.description: Manage affiliate applications and monitor performance

filters.title: Filters
filters.search: Search by name, email, or code...

commissions.title: Commissions
commissions.description: All commissions earned by this affiliate

approveDialog.title: Approve Affiliate
approveDialog.description: Set commission rate and approve this affiliate application
approveDialog.commissionRateDescription: Default is 20%. You can set a custom rate between 0-50%

rejectDialog.title: Reject Affiliate
rejectDialog.description: Please provide a reason for rejecting this application
rejectDialog.reasonPlaceholder: e.g., Website does not meet our guidelines...

commissionRateDialog.title: Update Commission Rate
commissionRateDialog.description: Set a custom commission rate for this affiliate
commissionRateDialog.label: New Commission Rate (%)

dialog.rejectionReasonPlaceholder: Why is this payout being rejected?
dialog.transactionIdDescription: PayPal transaction ID, bank transfer reference, etc.

referredAuthors.title: Referred Authors
referredAuthors.description: View all authors you have referred and their purchase activity

table.title: Referred Authors List
table.description: Click on an author to see their purchase history
table.emptyDescription: Share your referral link to start earning commissions!
table.author: Author
